question: Andrea receives 90 emails a day. 30% of those emails don't require any response. He responds to the rest of them. How many emails does Andrea respond to in a 7 day work week?
answer:
Andrea receives 90*30/100=<<90*30/100=27>>27 emails that don't require a response
So he responds to 90-27=<<90-27=63>>63 emails per day
In a 7 day work week, Andrea responds to 63*7=<<63*7=441>> 441 emails
#### 441
